_sText: It's like the Japanese TV-show, only now you will get to play it. You have to stay alive, jump into the shapes/holes in the wall, if you do not hit it correctly, then you will be pushed to the water and die. If you finish the map, then you will have a knife fight with the winners of the opposite team. There are 2 songs that are choosen randomly when the game starts, it is: Original Tetris song Guitar version of the Original Tetris song In "Assessments" it was not suppose to say "Teamplay" but "Looks" my bad, so consider that when you make a assessment! - Enjoy This is the sequel (2 version) of my original map: mg_humantetrix_final
